 2013-09962013-10-01,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of MONIQUE JÉRÔME-FORGET of Montréal, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 29, 2016, in the place of David H. Laidley.
